title: Voxiversity: Thucydides
author: VD
content_html:
You’ve been given adequate time to procure a text of History of the Peloponnesian War so it’s time to start reading if you haven’t begun to do so already. Read from section 1.1 through section 1.115 by next Saturday, which is when the 12-question quiz will be posted and the discussion gets rolling.

Please let me know here in the comments if you’re actually participating in this one so that I can get a rough idea of how many people are reading even if they’re not taking part in the subsequent discussions.
content_text:
You’ve been given adequate time to procure a text of
History of the Peloponnesian War
so it’s time to start reading if you haven’t begun to do so already.  Read from section 1.1 through section 1.115 by next Saturday, which is when the 12-question quiz will be posted and the discussion gets rolling.
Please let me know here in the comments if you’re actually participating in this one so that I can get a rough idea of how many people are reading even if they’re not taking part in the subsequent discussions.
